newsitem.title: USA: Health and Retirement option exercised.
newsitem.headline: Health and Retirement option exercised.

text.p: Health and Retirement Properties Trust said on Monday underwriters of its recent 23.5 million common share public offering have exercised their over-allotment option to purchase an additional 3,525,000 common shares.
The share price was $18.875 per share.
The gross proceeds from the sale of common shares represented by this overallotment option was $66,534,375, the company said.
Gross proceeds from the offering totaled $510.1 million, Health and Retirement Properties said.

Health and Retirement Properties expects to use the proceeds from the offering to purchase a portfolio of 30 office properties leased to the U.S. Government, to repay debt and fund future investments, the company said.

The offering was led by Donaldson, Lufkin & Jenrette Securities Corp and was co-managed by Dean Witter Reynolds Inc, A.G. Edwards & Sons Inc, Merrill Lynch & Co, NatWest Securities Ltd, PaineWebber Inc, Prudential Securities Inc, Salomon Brothers Inc, and Smith Barney Inc, the company said.
